current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To direct the Office of the Actuary of the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services and the Comptroller General of the United States to study the
			 impact of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act on small
			 businesses.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Study on impact on small business jobs

, shall

text.#text:
Not later than 1 year after the date of enactment of this Act, and December 1 for each of the 4
			 consecutive years

the impact of any increased health insurance costs resulting from the provisions of such Act on
			 economic indicators (including jobs lost, hours worked per employee, and
			 any resulting loss of wages); and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
(relating to shared responsibility
			 for employers regarding health coverage) on economic indicators, including
			 any jobs lost.

the impact of requirements and benefits pursuant to such Act on the small group health insurance
